entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 01:33 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets before morning. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
